pages.text: As you're reading this, your mind tainted by the story of Midas and his touch of gold, you might expect something similar from the $(item)Golden Heart Aspect$(). Well, I'm happy to inform you that you're in fact completely wrong. Instead, it bestows upon you $(item)Absorption$() when broken. Not only that, it also applies a higher level the further down your health bar it's located.
$(o)$(#999999)i honestly don't understand how anyone could possibly eat this.$()
